comments.author: Sariel V.7024
comments.body:
Not sure where to start this topic, but since I found this among the new API items, why not here?

It looks like we’ve got a source of exotic 80 gear with starter skins and HoT runes. For example, this

Is this from the level 80 boost we were given with the free account-wide inventory slot?
